html:
8.18.24  3:42 am   today is my friends birthday, he wants me to ask you a question, how would you make a birthday really really good. please answer fast, there is not a lot of time left.

      i have no idea how to do that, but if you try too hard then you mess up the rest of the year. so i don't try to do that

8.18.24  2:16 am   Whatever was that bad thing that you did

      i have never done a thing

8.18.24  2:07 am   were you the kid that are bugs for lunch

      no

8.18.24  2:03 am   Thoughts on the metric system?

      too good. don't use

8.17.24  11:42 pm   true or false

      both

8.17.24  11:41 pm   opinions on school?

      sometimes it can be an unexpected place for great teachers to hide

8.17.24  11:09 pm   are stories like fragments of stained glass you put together or like a sapling you grow over time?

      yes but there's also a 3rd way for stories to be

8.17.24  10:26 pm   What's something that's impossible?

      things being possible

8.17.24  4:57 pm   do you know of a good open source, highly customizable video editor? i'm so sick of using ones that don't even let me rearrange the various panels on my screen or give me full and complete control over mouse and keyboard shortcuts

      it's time for you to make your own software

8.17.24  4:48 pm   Have you ever seen a unicorn before?

      no

8.17.24  3:49 pm   pick a number

      that's the part i'm not good at

8.17.24  11:28 am   There's this dude who's saying that my mix is "muddy", but I really can't tell how & why he's insisting his way is better. It's making me inclined to think that a lot of mixing music is a sham. Do you think this dude is being reasonable?

      a common misconception about mixing, is that it means arguing with someone else about whether you like how something sounds. in this case, you can just forget all about it and just make sure you like what you hear

8.17.24  6:29 am   if it is it, was it it, or it is it and was is was?

      it was it and still is, as was was was (and still is)

8.17.24  1:02 am   Today I learned that our emotions are like a sine wave. We go from highs to lows and spend most of our time in between.

     some people spend most of the time in the highs and lows

      My emotional sine wave has a very high frequency and amplitude, so I often have mood swings that go between really low and really high. This diminishes my quality of life and I want it to change. How do I lower the frequency and amplitude, aka how do I lessen my emotional instability? Do you experience this yourself? What has helped you in the past?

     what might possibly be a reliable way to obtain solace is to tell the story of the ups and downs. think about it...... wild ups and downs is what stories are made of, really. so at least this way you'll feel like you're doing something useful

8.17.24  1:00 am   On a scale from 1-10, how much do you like orangutans? Also, how many orangutans can you fit inside your bedroom?

      i think you're overestimating my relationship with orangutans

8.17.24  12:45 am   Would you ever make an audiobook?

      fuck it, how about a videobook

8.16.24  11:26 pm   i accidentally replaced an important hobby/avocation of mine with a new totally different hobby

      that's normal. it also sounds exciting, and then it will be exciting again later when you rediscover the first thing. maybe even exciting another time when you discover the second thing for the second time

8.16.24  11:26 pm   Is there such a thing as random? 

      sure. random, for example, is whether this is 1 or 2

8.16.24  10:29 pm   Hey, wanna go to Red Lobster sometime?

      i'd love to see one of those fly-throughs

8.16.24  9:27 pm   opinion on chicken nuggets

      too real

8.16.24  8:57 pm   Know any economists?

      yes they are very friendly. that's the best part about knowing economists

8.16.24  6:07 pm   whats the answer to life the universe and everything

      a meme from a book that's outlived the book

8.16.24  4:42 pm   what should I do on the plane tomorrow

      keep a small journal of what kind of improvements you'd be really excited about making to your life when you get home

8.16.24  3:19 pm   What's a good piece of advice for almost anyone?

      in some countries, gravity goes upwards for political reasons

8.16.24  2:38 pm   is it ok to name a cat "balls"

      sure. also ok to name balls a cat

8.16.24  1:56 pm   can music theory be as musical as the music itself is musical, or is it only (or mostly) just theoretical?

     if it's not as musical as the music, it's not gonna be the music. i apologize if this seems obvious

     actually, maybe music is everywhere - even when you can hear nothing at all

     music is generally sound related

     maybe the question itself is music

      this particular qusetion does not seem to be an audio question

8.16.24  1:49 pm   do you believe in god?

      if you can explain what that is, then perhaps i could tell you whether or not i believe in what you've explained

8.16.24  12:21 pm   I want to learn to drive, do you have any advice?

      turn the wheel left to go left, turn right to turn right, and honk to go straight i think

8.16.24  12:21 pm   Why do you entertain us?

      someone's gotta do it

8.16.24  12:00 pm   give me a random object

      there's no such thing as a random object

8.16.24  11:03 am   when is the next video?

      there's going to be a large amount of videos over the course of the next 10 years, but that's not all

8.16.24  8:47 am   can a dinosaur ride a bike?

      not right now

8.16.24  6:51 am   How do I find out what I want to do?

      just do everything. you want to do everything

8.16.24  4:07 am   Do you know any songs where the melody starts on the 4th degree of the scale?

      thousands. this is normal behavior for a song. but if you don't believe me, you can check out 'shape of my heart' by the backstreet boys and check out how normal it sounds

8.16.24  3:45 am   Should I eat a mango while doing the tango with Rango?

      you needn't feel obligated to

8.16.24  1:41 am   do you consider yourself to be the simplest?

      no

8.16.24  1:05 am   Did you watch the olympics

      no, but i'm confident that they are still happening anyway

8.15.24  11:05 pm   If you respond to mundane questions with absurd answers and absurd questions with mundane answers, how absurd/mundane would a question have to be for you to respond with an answer of the same mundaneness/absurdity?

      half way, or course

8.15.24  11:01 pm   Should I get back into playing the bass?

      if you think there is music that needs bass

8.15.24  10:26 pm   Got any plans to publish a book? That would be super cool. I like books with hard covers, though. They feel more better to hold. How about you?

      i was gonna see if i could get the cover inside the book

8.15.24  10:08 pm   Is there any part of the process of making a song that's the most fun for you (idea, finishing the idea into a song, recording, finishing up mixing)? Could rank them too

      i'm always incentivized to think that whatever the current task is is the most fun. to be honest, it's never hard to find and hold that belief. (this is despite the fact any of those tasks can momentarily become a nightmare at any time)

8.15.24  9:29 pm   How many questions do you usually get a day

      all of them

8.15.24  8:48 pm   Which of your songs would you say is most similar to a TV dinner?

      it's gonna be different depending on your mood when you listen to it

8.15.24  8:14 pm   should i eat blades of grass

      don't feel obligated to

8.15.24  5:47 pm   is your music psychedelic?

      it can be

8.15.24  5:40 pm   what do you think the best music program is?

      actually being there

8.15.24  3:48 pm   What is/are the best pizza toppings?

      how about the burden of free choice

8.15.24  2:01 pm   I ran out of questions, now what?

      you know everything now

8.15.24  1:35 pm   I'm learning blender what should I use it to make

      in this case, you should be making blender tutorials
